languages.text: "О, Ваша Светлость, какой каверзный вопрос! Вы задаете его всем, кто может не сносить головы за одну неудачную ремарку о вашей предшественнице? Выражусь так: нескучно и весьма прибыльно. У Империума миллиарды подданых, но только единицы среди них делают то, что любят, и к чему пригодны. Я бы сказал, что госпоже Теодоре очень повезло — она была прирожденным Вольным Торговцем. И собирала вокруг себя тех, кто знал и любил свое дело. Это редкий талант".

traits.locale_text: "Прежде всего, нескучно. В Администратуме треть твоих распоряжений и приказов сразу отвергают как невыполнимые, еще треть берут на рассмотрение через два года и все равно отвергают. Оставшиеся начинают выполнять, через пять лет — но не до конца, потому что выясняется, ответственный чиновник скончался сорок лет назад от каликсийской подагры. Госпожа Теодора показала мне, что можно иначе. Брать инициативу в свои руки и видеть результат".

languages.text: "Oh, now that's a tricky question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do you ask it of everyone, knowing they risk losing their head should they let slip a careless remark about your predecessor? I shall put it thus: working with Lady Theodora was never boring and always profitable. The Imperium has billions of subjects, but very few do what they love and what they are best suited to. I would say Lady Theodora was one of the fortunate ones — she was a model Rogue Trader, and she surrounded herself with those who excelled at and loved their work. Hers was a rare talent indeed."
languages.original_text: "О, Ваша Светлость, какой каверзный вопрос! Вы задаете его всем, кто может не сносить головы за одну неудачную ремарку о вашей предшественнице? Выражусь так: нескучно и весьма прибыльно. У Империума миллиарды подданых, но только единицы среди них делают то, что любят, и к чему пригодны. Я бы сказал, что госпоже Теодоре очень повезло — она была прирожденным Вольным Торговцем. И собирала вокруг себя тех, кто знал и любил свое дело. Это редкий талант".

traits.locale_text: "What a tricky question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do you ask everyone who may lose their head if they let slip a careless remark about your relative? Let me put it this way: it was never boring and always profitable. Imperium has billions of subjects, but very few are doing what they like and what they are best suited to. I would say Mistress Theodora was one of the fortunate ones — she was a model Rogue Trader and surrounded herself with those who excelled at their craft and loved their vocation. It is rare talent indeed."

"What a tricky question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do you ask everyone who may lose their head if they let slip a careless remark about your relative? Let me put it this way: it was never boring and always profitable. Imperium has billions of subjects, but very few are doing what they like and what they are best suited to. I would say Mistress Theodora was one of the fortunate ones — she was a model Rogue Trader and surrounded herself with those who excelled at their craft and loved their vocation. It is rare talent indeed."

I would say Mistress Theodora was one of the fortunate ones — she was a model Rogue Trader and surrounded herself with those who excelled at their craft and loved their vocation. Hers was a rare talent indeed."

I would say Lady Theodora was one of the fortunate ones — she was a model Rogue Trader, and she surrounded herself with those who excelled at and loved their work. Hers was a rare talent indeed."

"Oh, now that's a tricky question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do you ask it of everyone, knowing they risk losing their head should they let slip a careless remark about your predecessor? I shall put it thus: working with Lady Theodora was never boring and always profitable. The Imperium has billions of subjects, but very few do what they love and what they are best suited to. I would say Lady Theodora was one of the fortunate ones — she was a model Rogue Trader, and she surrounded herself with those who excelled at and loved their work. Hers was a rare talent indeed."

languages.text: “噢，这还真是个棘手的问题啊，{mf|大人|大人}！您是不是会问每个人这种问题呢？您也明知，一旦对方不经意间对前任行商浪人做出了不合适的评价，就有可能会掉脑袋，是吗？可以这么说，与西奥多拉夫人共事从来都不会无聊，而且始终都有利可图。帝国有几百亿、几千亿的臣民，但很少会有人做着他们又喜欢、又擅长的事情。我想说，西奥多拉是那些少数幸运儿之一。她是行商浪人的典范，而且她身边全都是那些既热爱、又擅长工作的人们。像她这么出色的人，确实非常罕见。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, now that's a tricky question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do you ask it of everyone, knowing they risk losing their head should they let slip a careless remark about your predecessor? I shall put it thus: working with Lady Theodora was never boring and always profitable. The Imperium has billions of subjects, but very few do what they love and what they are best suited to. I would say Lady Theodora was one of the fortunate ones — she was a model Rogue Trader, and she surrounded herself with those who excelled at and loved their work. Hers was a rare talent indeed."

traits.locale_text: “噢，这还真是个棘手的问题啊，{mf|大人|大人}！您是不是会问每个人这种问题呢？您也明知，一旦对方不经意间对前任行商浪人做出了不合适的评价，就有可能会会掉脑袋，是吗？可以这么说，与西奥多拉夫人共事从来都不会无聊，而且始终都有利可图。帝国有几百亿、几千亿的臣民，但很少会有人做着他们又喜欢、又擅长的事情。我想说，西奥多拉是那些少数幸运儿之一。她是行商浪人的典范，而且她身边全都是那些既热爱、又擅长工作的人们。像她这么出色的人，确实非常罕见。”

languages.text: «Uf, ¡es una pregunta complicada, mil{mf|ord|ady}! ¿Se la hace a todo el mundo, sabiendo que se arriesgan a perder la cabeza si dicen algo inapropiado sobre su predecesora? Solo diré lo siguiente: trabajar para lady Theodora nunca fue aburrido y siempre fue lucrativo. El Imperium tiene miles de millones de súbditos, de los que pocos pueden dedicarse a algo que les guste y a la vez se les dé bien, y lady Theodora era una de esas pocas personas. Era una Comerciante Independiente modelo y se rodeaba de gente excepcional que disfrutaba con su trabajo y estaba dotada para él. Tenía un talento nada común».
languages.original_text: "Oh, now that's a tricky question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do you ask it of everyone, knowing they risk losing their head should they let slip a careless remark about your predecessor? I shall put it thus: working with Lady Theodora was never boring and always profitable. The Imperium has billions of subjects, but very few do what they love and what they are best suited to. I would say Lady Theodora was one of the fortunate ones — she was a model Rogue Trader, and she surrounded herself with those who excelled at and loved their work. Hers was a rare talent indeed."

traits.locale_text: «Uf, ¡es una pregunta complicada, mil{mf|ord|ady}! ¿Se la hace a todo el mundo, sabiendo que se arriesgan a perder la cabeza si dicen algo inapropiado sobre su predecesora? Solo diré lo siguiente: trabajar para lady Theodora nunca fue aburrido y siempre fue lucrativo. El Imperium tiene miles de millones de súbditos, de los que pocos pueden dedicarse a algo que les guste y a la vez se les dé bien, y lady Theodora era una de esas pocas personas. Era una Comerciante Independiente modelo y se rodeaba de gente excepcional que disfrutaba con su trabajo y estaba dotada para él. Tenía un talento nada común».

languages.text: 「ああ、それは難しい質問でございますな、{mf|陛下|陛下}！前任者について不用意な発言をすれば首が飛ぶとわかっていながら、あらゆる人に尋ね回っているのでしょうか？テオドラ様との仕事は退屈せず、常に有益でありました。帝国には何十億という臣民がいますが、自分の好きなこと、自分に最も適したことをする者はごくわずかです。彼女はローグトレーダーの模範であり、自分の仕事に秀でた者、仕事を愛する者に囲まれていたのです。彼女は本当に稀有な才能を持っておりました」
languages.original_text: "Oh, now that's a tricky question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do you ask it of everyone, knowing they risk losing their head should they let slip a careless remark about your predecessor? I shall put it thus: working with Lady Theodora was never boring and always profitable. The Imperium has billions of subjects, but very few do what they love and what they are best suited to. I would say Lady Theodora was one of the fortunate ones — she was a model Rogue Trader, and she surrounded herself with those who excelled at and loved their work. Hers was a rare talent indeed."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、それは難しい質問でございますな、{mf|陛下|陛下}！前任者について不用意な発言をすれば首が飛ぶとわかっていながら、あらゆる人に尋ね回っているのでしょうか？テオドラ様との仕事は退屈せず、常に有益でありました。帝国には何十億という臣民がいますが、自分の好きなこと、自分に最も適したことをする者はごくわずかです。彼女はローグトレーダーの模範であり、自分の仕事に秀でた者、仕事を愛する者に囲まれていたのです。彼女は本当に稀有な才能を持っておりました」

languages.text: "Oh, das ist eine heikle Frage, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Stellt Ihr sie allen, in dem Wissen, dass sie den Kopf verlieren, wenn sie eine unvorsichtige Bemerkung über Eure Vorgängerin äußern? Ich sage mal so: Die Arbeit mit Lady Theodora war niemals langweilig und stets profitabel. Das Imperium hat Milliarden von Untertanen, aber nur wenige tun, was sie lieben und wofür sie am besten geeignet sind. Ich würde sagen, Lady Theodora gehörte zu diesen Glücklichen – sie war eine vorbildliche Freihändlerin und umgab sich nur mit Leuten, die ihre Arbeit liebten und gut darin waren. Sie war darin überaus begabt."
languages.original_text: "Oh, now that's a tricky question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do you ask it of everyone, knowing they risk losing their head should they let slip a careless remark about your predecessor? I shall put it thus: working with Lady Theodora was never boring and always profitable. The Imperium has billions of subjects, but very few do what they love and what they are best suited to. I would say Lady Theodora was one of the fortunate ones — she was a model Rogue Trader, and she surrounded herself with those who excelled at and loved their work. Hers was a rare talent indeed."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, das ist eine heikle Frage, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Stellt Ihr sie allen, in dem Wissen, dass sie den Kopf verlieren, wenn sie eine unvorsichtige Bemerkung über Eure Vorgängerin äußern? Ich sage mal so: Die Arbeit mit Lady Theodora war niemals langweilig und stets profitabel. Das Imperium hat Milliarden von Untertanen, aber nur wenige tun, was sie lieben und wofür sie am besten geeignet sind. Ich würde sagen, Lady Theodora gehörte zu diesen Glücklichen – sie war eine vorbildliche Freihändlerin und umgab sich nur mit Leuten, die ihre Arbeit liebten und gut darin waren. Sie war darin überaus begabt."

languages.text: « Hum, voilà une question délicate, Votre Seigneurie. La posez-vous à tous, en sachant que celui ou celle qui laissera échapper une remarque imprudente au sujet de votre devancière risque d'y laisser sa tête ? Alors, laisse-moi formuler ma réponse ainsi : travailler avec dame Théodora n'a jamais été fastidieux, et cela s'est toujours révélé enrichissant. L'Imperium compte des milliards de sujets, mais bien peu font ce qu'ils aiment ou ce qui leur convient le mieux. Je dirais que dame Théodora était l'une de ces rares âmes fortunées... Elle était une libre-marchande exemplaire ayant su s'entourer d'individus d'exception et qui adoraient leur travail. Un talent fort rare s'il en est. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, now that's a tricky question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do you ask it of everyone, knowing they risk losing their head should they let slip a careless remark about your predecessor? I shall put it thus: working with Lady Theodora was never boring and always profitable. The Imperium has billions of subjects, but very few do what they love and what they are best suited to. I would say Lady Theodora was one of the fortunate ones — she was a model Rogue Trader, and she surrounded herself with those who excelled at and loved their work. Hers was a rare talent indeed."

traits.locale_text: « Hum, voilà une question délicate, Votre Seigneurie. La posez-vous à tous, en sachant que celui ou celle qui laissera échapper une remarque imprudente au sujet de votre devancière risque d'y laisser sa tête ? Alors, laisse-moi formuler ma réponse ainsi : travailler avec dame Théodora n'a jamais été fastidieux, et cela s'est toujours révélé enrichissant. L'Imperium compte des milliards de sujets, mais bien peu font ce qu'ils aiment ou ce qui leur convient le mieux. Je dirais que dame Théodora était l'une de ces rares âmes fortunées... Elle était une libre-marchande exemplaire ayant su s'entourer d'individus d'exception et qui adoraient leur travail. Un talent fort rare s'il en est. »

languages.text: "İşte bu zor bir soru {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Bunu herkese soruyor musunuz? Selefiniz hakkında patavatsızca bir yorumda bulunmaları hâlinde kellelerini kaybedebileceklerini bilmelerine rağmen hem de. Şöyle söyleyeyim: Leydi Theodora ile çalışmak asla sıkıcı değildi, hep de kazançlı oldu. İmparatorluk'un tebaası milyarları aşar lakin bunların pek azı, sevdiği ve en uygun olduğu işi yapar. Leydi Theodora'nın şanslılardan biri olduğunu söyleyebilirim. O, örnek bir Hür Tacir'di ve etrafını; işlerini seven ve mesleklerinde sivrilmiş kişilerle çevirmişti. Gerçekten nadide bir yetenekti."
languages.original_text: "Oh, now that's a tricky question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Do you ask it of everyone, knowing they risk losing their head should they let slip a careless remark about your predecessor? I shall put it thus: working with Lady Theodora was never boring and always profitable. The Imperium has billions of subjects, but very few do what they love and what they are best suited to.
